## REGISTRATION & SUBMISSION

Authors are required to submit abstracts, full papers, and camera-ready papers separately using the confBay conference management system. Kindly click on the confBay icon below to go to the submission page. You have to create a confBay account first before you are allowed to log in to the submission page.

To register for the conference, please click : 

[![Conference Bay](images/iconfbay.png)](http://submit.confbay.com/conf/icms2025){target="_blank"}.
